trans-unit.source: Specifies options for committing management object changes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.PutOptions"></xref> class for put operations, using default values.
This is the default constructor.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.PutOptions"></xref> class for committing a WMI object, using the specified provider-specific context.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
A provider-specific, named-value pairs context object to be passed through to the provider.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.PutOptions"></xref> class for committing a WMI object, using the specified option values.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
A provider-specific, named-value pairs object to be passed through to the provider.
The length of time to let the operation perform before it times out.
The default is <xref href="System.TimeSpan.MaxValue"></xref>.
`true` if the returned objects should contain amended (locale-aware) qualifiers; otherwise, `false`.
The type of commit to be performed (update or create).
Returns a copy of the object.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The cloned object.
Gets or sets the type of commit to be performed for the object.
Property Value
The default value is <xref:System.Management.PutType>.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.Management.PutType"></xref> enumeration value representing the type of commit to be performed for the object.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.
Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.
Property Value
`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`.
The default value is `false`.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.
